I had too much trouble trying to revert some of the changes here. I decided to finally just close this PR and open a new one.

please, @tgroh  and @lukecwik  review and let me know if I need to change something. I think doing it this way removes a bit of complexity. One thing that I was not sure of was if immutability check should be able to detect deepcopies of objects. right now there is no test covering that case. I don't see why this case should be covered but I though it might be good to ear from more experienced people.
retest this please
